### Temporary workspaces
Workspaces are meant to be temporary. The longer the workspace exists, the more vulnerable it becomes because the workspace needs regular updates to stay secure.

Follow [best practices](link to best practices) to make it easy to delete a workspace and create a new one without hassle.
